column1: Funeral service will be at 10:30 a.m. Saturday
column3: in the Memorial Chapel of Chastain Funeral Home & Cremation Center with Reverend Steve Jones officiating.  Burial will be in Mitchell Cemetery. Friends may call from 5:00-8:00 p.m. on Friday and from 9:30 a.m. until the service on Saturday at the funeral home.
